column4: ljl, see i use a gui back in the days of windows, but i like to use hotkeys.  so, i don't need the mouse when im doing file management, but im not too fast with the terminal yet.  i really like it though, and have been putting time aside to understand it and learn it
whats the folder called "mnt" do in the "/" dir?   is it a mnt folder?
like any other regular directory, what does it do?
media, has ya physcial drivers, home is ya personal drives.  whats the mnt dir do?
like  one more time, what does any regular directory do?
ljl, whats the mnt dir in the / dir of a file system?
it would not be any different
it holds shit. is it ment to hold mount files?
